name: SpaceBus (itch)
description:
SPACEBUS

Keep SpaceBus running.
Deliver passengers safely.

CONTROLS
  • [WASD/Arrows]  Move / Climb
  • [SPACE]  Maintenance / Repair / Quick Fix / Interact
  • [SHIFT]   Pick Up / Drop Tool
TIPS
  • If you're not holding a tool, use your duct tape for a Quick Fix
  • Machines fail faster when other machines are failing
CREDITS

Incredulous Games : Ryan Printz & Josh Guerrero

  • IG: @IncredulousGames
  • Twitter: @IncredulousDevs
